20110116190157.000|20110116190158.000|CC1|MORNING, AS DOCTORS WERE ABLE TO
20110116190158.000|20110116190201.000|CC1|REMOVE CONGRESSWOMAN GABRIELLE  
20110116190201.000|20110116190205.000|CC1|GIFFORDS FROM A VENTILATOR,     
20110116190205.000|20110116190205.000|CC1|YESTERDAY.                      
20110116190205.000|20110116190206.000|CC1|MEANING SHE IS ABLE TO BREATHE  
20110116190206.000|20110116190206.000|CC1|ON HER OWN.

20110116190208.000|20110116190210.000|CC1|TRAGEDY IN TUCSON.              
20110116190210.000|20110116190210.000|CC1|SHE REMAINS IN CRITICAL         
20110116190210.000|20110116190215.000|CC1|CONDITION.

20110116190218.000|20110116190219.000|CC1|TWO OTHER VICTIMS BESIDES THE   
20110116190219.000|20110116190219.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN ARE STILL IN THE  
20110116190219.000|20110116190220.000|CC1|HOSPITAL.                       
20110116190220.000|20110116190224.000|CC1|JOINING US NOW, DEMOCRATIC      
20110116190224.000|20110116190225.000|CC1|SENATOR FROM NEW YORK, KIRSTEN  
20110116190225.000|20110116190229.000|CC1|GILLIBRAND, WELCOME.            
20110116190229.000|20110116190232.000|CC1|IT IS SO NICE TO HAVE YOU HERE. 
20110116190232.000|20110116190233.000|CC1|WHAT CAN YOU TELL US ABOUT HOW  
20110116190233.000|20110116190233.000|CC1|SHE'S DOING?                    
20110116190233.000|20110116190234.000|CC1|>> SHE'S DOING GREAT.           
20110116190234.000|20110116190234.000|CC1|I TALKED TO HER HUSBAND, MARK,  
20110116190234.000|20110116190235.000|CC1|LAST NIGHT.                     
20110116190235.000|20110116190236.000|CC1|SHE IS MAKING PROGRESS.         
20110116190236.000|20110116190237.000|CC1|AND IF THERE'S ANYONE IN THE    
20110116190237.000|20110116190238.000|CC1|WORLD THAT WILL RECOVER FULLY   
20110116190238.000|20110116190239.000|CC1|FROM THIS KIND OF CRIME AND     
20110116190239.000|20110116190240.000|CC1|UNBELIEVABLE INJURY, IT'S HER.  
20110116190240.000|20110116190242.000|CC1|SHE HAS COURAGE.                
20110116190242.000|20110116190243.000|CC1|SHE HAS DRIVE.                  
20110116190243.000|20110116190244.000|CC1|SHE HAS SPIRIT.                 
20110116190244.000|20110116190246.000|CC1|AND I REALLY THINK HER COURAGE  
20110116190246.000|20110116190247.000|CC1|IS INSPIRING ALL OF US RIGHT    
20110116190247.000|20110116190247.000|CC1|NOW.                            
20110116190247.000|20110116190249.000|CC1|>> YOU TALK ABOUT HER CONDITION.
20110116190249.000|20110116190250.000|CC1|YOU TWO, OF COURSE, GOOD FRIENDS
20110116190250.000|20110116190252.000|CC1|DATING BACK TO WHEN SHE AND YOU 
20110116190252.000|20110116190254.000|CC1|CAME INTO THE CONGRESS.         
20110116190254.000|20110116190255.000|CC1|HAS SHE ACTUALLY BEEN ABLE TO   
20110116190255.000|20110116190255.000|CC1|SPEAK?                          
20110116190255.000|20110116190258.000|CC1|>> NO, NO.                      
20110116190258.000|20110116190259.000|CC1|IT'S FAR TOO EARLY FOR THAT.    
20110116190259.000|20110116190300.000|CC1|SHE'S MAKING PROGRESS EVERY DAY.
20110116190300.000|20110116190301.000|CC1|SHE'S USING BOTH SIDES OF HER   
20110116190301.000|20110116190302.000|CC1|BODY.

20110116190303.000|20110116190304.000|CC1|OWN.                            
20110116190304.000|20110116190306.000|CC1|SHE'S ABLE TO OPEN HER EYES AND 
20110116190306.000|20110116190307.000|CC1|SHOW PEOPLE SHE UNDERSTANDS WHAT
20110116190307.000|20110116190312.000|CC1|SHE'S HEARING AND SEEING.       
20110116190312.000|20110116190313.000|CC1|IT'S AN EXTRAORDINARY AMOUNT OF 
20110116190313.000|20110116190314.000|CC1|PROGRESS FOR A WOMAN WHO        
20110116190314.000|20110116190315.000|CC1|SUSTAINED SUCH A HORRIFIC INJURY
20110116190315.000|20110116190319.000|CC1|THAT SHE DID.                   
20110116190319.000|20110116190320.000|CC1|>> THERE WAS AN INCREDIBLE      
20110116190320.000|20110116190321.000|CC1|MOMENT DURING THE MEMORIAL      
20110116190321.000|20110116190323.000|CC1|SERVICE THIS WEEK WHEN THE      
20110116190323.000|20110116190324.000|CC1|PRESIDENT, WHO HAD VISITED WITH 
20110116190324.000|20110116190325.000|CC1|THE CONGRESSWOMAN, WHEN YOU WERE
20110116190325.000|20110116190327.000|CC1|IN THE ROOM, AS WELL, SPOKE     
20110116190327.000|20110116190328.000|CC1|ABOUT A BIG DEVELOPMENT WHEN SHE
20110116190328.000|20110116190330.000|CC1|OPENED HER EYES.                
20110116190330.000|20110116190331.000|CC1|THIS IS HOW HE DESCRIBED IT.    
20110116190331.000|20110116190333.000|CC1|>> A FEW MINUTES AFTER WE LEFT  
20110116190333.000|20110116190333.000|CC1|THE ROOM AND SOME OF HER        
20110116190333.000|20110116190335.000|CC1|COLLEAGUES FROM CONGRESS WERE IN
20110116190335.000|20110116190336.000|CC1|THE ROOM, GABBY OPENED HER EYES 
20110116190336.000|20110116190339.000|CC1|FOR THE FIRST TIME.             
20110116190339.000|20110116190340.000|CC1|GABBY OPENED HER EYES FOR THE   
20110116190340.000|20110116190343.000|CC1|FIRST TIME.                     
20110116190343.000|20110116190344.000|CC1|>> DESCRIBE WHAT THAT MOMENT WAS
20110116190344.000|20110116190347.000|CC1|LIKE.                           
20110116190347.000|20110116190348.000|CC1|>> THE MOMENT THE PRESIDENT SAID
20110116190348.000|20110116190349.000|CC1|THAT?                           
20110116190349.000|20110116190349.000|CC1|>> BEING IN THE ROOM.           
20110116190349.000|20110116190350.000|CC1|>> I'LL DO BOTH.                
20110116190350.000|20110116190350.000|CC1|WHEN THE PRESIDENT SAID THAT,   
20110116190350.000|20110116190351.000|CC1|THE ROOM ERUPTED.               
20110116190351.000|20110116190352.000|CC1|THESE ARE HER CONSTITUENTS.     
20110116190352.000|20110116190352.000|CC1|THEY LOVE HER.                  
20110116190352.000|20110116190353.000|CC1|THEY'RE SEEING HER RECOVERY AS A
20110116190353.000|20110116190354.000|CC1|STORY OF TRIUMPH OVER TERRIBLE  
20110116190354.000|20110116190400.000|CC1|HAPPENING.                      
20110116190400.000|20110116190402.000|CC1|SHE IS REALLY SOMEONE --        
20110116190402.000|20110116190402.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF HER COURAGE AND      
20110116190402.000|20110116190404.000|CC1|STRENGTH, SHE CAN OVERCOME THIS.
20110116190404.000|20110116190405.000|CC1|BEING IN THE ROOM AT THE TIME   
20110116190405.000|20110116190407.000|CC1|WAS AN EXTRAORDINARY MOMENT, A  
20110116190407.000|20110116190408.000|CC1|MOMENT YOU REALLY CAN'T IMAGINE.
20110116190408.000|20110116190410.000|CC1|BUT IT LITERALLY WAS THE WILL OF
20110116190410.000|20110116190411.000|CC1|HER HUSBAND, DRAWING HER OUT,   
20110116190411.000|20110116190412.000|CC1|SAYING, CAN YOU SEE?            
20110116190412.000|20110116190414.000|CC1|CAN YOU OPEN YOUR EYES?         
20110116190414.000|20110116190415.000|CC1|CAN YOU SEE ME?                 
20110116190415.000|20110116190418.000|CC1|SHE LET HIM KNOW BY GIVING HIM A
20110116190418.000|20110116190419.000|CC1|THUMB'S UP THAT SHE COULD SEE   
20110116190419.000|20110116190420.000|CC1|AND THAT SHE COULD ACTUALLY     
20110116190420.000|20110116190422.000|CC1|UNDERSTAND WHAT HE WAS SAYING.  
20110116190422.000|20110116190426.000|CC1|IT WAS AN EXTRAORDINARY MOMENT. 
20110116190426.000|20110116190426.000|CC1|IT WAS ALL ABOUT HER COURAGE AND
20110116190426.000|20110116190428.000|CC1|HER STRENGTH.                   
20110116190428.000|20110116190429.000|CC1|>> WHAT SENSE DO YOU HAVE BEING 
20110116190429.000|20110116190430.000|CC1|IN THE ROOM AND WITH HER        
20110116190430.000|20110116190431.000|CC1|HUSBAND, MARK, WHO HAS BEEN SUCH
20110116190431.000|20110116190433.000|CC1|A TOWER OF STRENGTH THROUGH     
20110116190433.000|20110116190434.000|CC1|THIS, THAT SHE HAS A SENSE OF   
20110116190434.000|20110116190435.000|CC1|WHAT'S HAPPENING AROUND HER AND 
20110116190435.000|20110116190437.000|CC1|THIS OUTPOURING FOR HER?        
20110116190437.000|20110116190439.000|CC1|>> JUST WHEN DEBBIE WASSERMAN   
20110116190439.000|20110116190440.000|CC1|SCHULTZ AND I WERE THERE WITH   
20110116190440.000|20110116190444.000|CC1|SPEAKER PELOSI AND SHE SQUEEZED 
20110116190444.000|20110116190446.000|CC1|OUR HAND, IT WAS VERY CLEAR TO  
20110116190446.000|20110116190447.000|CC1|US THAT SHE UNDERSTOOD          
20110116190447.000|20110116190449.000|CC1|EVERYTHING WE WERE SAYING.      
20110116190449.000|20110116190450.000|CC1|SHE'S A FIGHTER.                
20110116190450.000|20110116190453.000|CC1|SHE WILL OVERCOME THIS.         
20110116190453.000|20110116190454.000|CC1|I THINK WE CAN ALL TAKE A LESSON
20110116190454.000|20110116190456.000|CC1|FROM HER.                       
20110116190456.000|20110116190457.000|CC1|GABBY IS ONE OF THE MOST        
20110116190457.000|20110116190459.000|CC1|NONPARTISAN PEOPLE I EVER MET.  
20110116190459.000|20110116190502.000|CC1|SHE TRULY EPITOMIZES WHAT THE   
20110116190502.000|20110116190504.000|CC1|PRESIDENT SAID IN HIS SPEECH,   
20110116190504.000|20110116190504.000|CC1|THAT WE, AS A NATION, NEED TO BE
20110116190504.000|20110116190508.000|CC1|BETTER THAN WE ARE.             
20110116190508.000|20110116190509.000|CC1|WE NEED TO LIVE UP TO THE IMAGE 
20110116190509.000|20110116190511.000|CC1|AND VIEW OF DEMOCRACY THAT OUR  
20110116190511.000|20110116190512.000|CC1|CHILDREN HAVE.                  
20110116190512.000|20110116190512.000|CC1|THAT'S WHO GABBY IS.            
20110116190512.000|20110116190516.000|CC1|SHE COMES TO SERVICE WITH THE   
20110116190516.000|20110116190517.000|CC1|GOAL OF JUST HELPING PEOPLE AND 
20110116190517.000|20110116190519.000|CC1|BRINGING PEOPLE TOGETHER.       
20110116190519.000|20110116190520.000|CC1|SHE REALLY IS SOMEONE WE CAN ALL
20110116190520.000|20110116190521.000|CC1|LOOK TO, AS SHE STRUGGLES       
20110116190521.000|20110116190522.000|CC1|THROUGH THIS BECAUSE OF HER     
20110116190522.000|20110116190523.000|CC1|DRIVE, BECAUSE OF HER COURAGE.  
20110116190523.000|20110116190524.000|CC1|WE CAN ALL TAKE FROM OUR        
20110116190524.000|20110116190526.000|CC1|STRENGTH AND, HOPEFULLY, AS     
20110116190526.000|20110116190527.000|CC1|OURSELVES, BE BETTER THAN WE    
20110116190527.000|20110116190528.000|CC1|ARE.                            
20110116190528.000|20110116190529.000|CC1|>> SHE CERTAINLY WOULD BE A     
20110116190529.000|20110116190533.000|CC1|VOICE IN OUR CONVERSATION?      
20110116190533.000|20110116190536.000|CC1|>> VERY MUCH SO.                
20110116190536.000|20110116190536.000|CC1|AND SHE WAS BEFORE THIS         
20110116190536.000|20110116190537.000|CC1|INCIDENT.                       
20110116190537.000|20110116190537.000|CC1|SHE WAS SOMEBODY WHO CALLED US  
20110116190537.000|20110116190539.000|CC1|ALL TO HAVE A BETTER DISCOURSE, 
20110116190539.000|20110116190540.000|CC1|TO RESPECT EACH OTHER'S         
20110116190540.000|20110116190540.000|CC1|POSITIONS.                      
20110116190540.000|20110116190542.000|CC1|WE HAD TOUGH ISSUES.            
20110116190542.000|20110116190543.000|CC1|THERE ARE SO MANY DIFFICULT     
20110116190543.000|20110116190544.000|CC1|ISSUES RIGHT NOW.               
20110116190544.000|20110116190545.000|CC1|AN ECONOMY IS STILL SUFFERING,  
20110116190545.000|20110116190547.000|CC1|BEING SO CLOSE TO A 10%         
20110116190547.000|20110116190551.000|CC1|UNEMPLOYMENT RATE.              
20110116190551.000|20110116190553.000|CC1|DOESN'T TELL A STORY.           
20110116190553.000|20110116190555.000|CC1|FAMILIES ARE SUFFERING IN NEW   
20110116190555.000|20110116190556.000|CC1|YORK.                           
20110116190556.000|20110116190557.000|CC1|THEY REALLY ARE HAVING A TOUGH  
20110116190557.000|20110116190557.000|CC1|TIME MAKING ENDS MEET.          
20110116190557.000|20110116190558.000|CC1|SO, WE HAVE TO, AS THE LEADERS, 
20110116190558.000|20110116190559.000|CC1|AS A BODY OF GOVERNMENT, COME   
20110116190559.000|20110116190600.000|CC1|TOGETHER AND DO THE PEOPLE'S    
20110116190600.000|20110116190600.000|CC1|BUSINESS.                       
20110116190600.000|20110116190601.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT THE ELECTION IS     
20110116190601.000|20110116190601.000|CC1|ABOUT.                          
20110116190601.000|20110116190602.000|CC1|THE ELECTION WAS ABOUT A DEMAND 
20110116190602.000|20110116190604.000|CC1|BY AMERICANS TO SAY, WE NEED YOU
20110116190604.000|20110116190606.000|CC1|TO PUT THESE PARTISAN POLITICS  
20110116190606.000|20110116190607.000|CC1|ASIDE.                          
20110116190607.000|20110116190608.000|CC1|WE NEED YOU TO GET THE PEOPLE'S 
20110116190608.000|20110116190609.000|CC1|BUSINESS DONE.                  
20110116190609.000|20110116190610.000|CC1|WE NEED YOU TO FIGHT FOR        
20110116190610.000|20110116190611.000|CC1|SOLUTIONS BECAUSE WE ARE        
20110116190611.000|20110116190612.000|CC1|SUFFERING.                      
20110116190612.000|20110116190613.000|CC1|SMALL BUSINESSES ARE STILL      
20110116190613.000|20110116190615.000|CC1|HAVING DIFFICULTY GROWING.      
20110116190615.000|20110116190616.000|CC1|WE'RE STILL HAVING DIFFICULTY   
20110116190616.000|20110116190618.000|CC1|CREATING THE JOBS THAT ARE      
20110116190618.000|20110116190619.000|CC1|NECESSARY TO GROW US OUT OF THIS
20110116190619.000|20110116190621.000|CC1|TOUGH ECONOMY.                  
20110116190621.000|20110116190622.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT WE'RE CALLED TO DO. 
20110116190622.000|20110116190625.000|CC1|I THINK GABBY'S STORY CERTAINLY 
20110116190625.000|20110116190625.000|CC1|INSPIRES ME AND CAN INSPIRE ALL 
20110116190625.000|20110116190627.000|CC1|OF US.

20110116190628.000|20110116190630.000|CC1|MORNING.                        
20110116190630.000|20110116190631.000|CC1|WE APPRECIATE IT.               
20110116190631.000|20110116190631.000|CC1|LOOK FORWARD TO HAVING YOU BACK.
20110116190631.000|20110116190633.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU.

20110116190702.000|20110116190705.000|CC1|SAID ENOUGH IS ENOUGH.

20110116191352.000|20110116191353.000|CC1|PAY ATTENTION TO THE LAWS IN THE
20110116191353.000|20110116191354.000|CC1|FIRST PLACE.                    
20110116191354.000|20110116191355.000|CC1|AND THERE'S NUMEROUS EXAMPLES   
20110116191355.000|20110116191356.000|CC1|THE LAST FEW YEARS WHERE        
20110116191356.000|20110116191357.000|CC1|CONCEALED CARRY HAS, IN FACT,   
20110116191357.000|20110116191359.000|CC1|BENEFITED PEOPLE, ESPECIALLY,   
20110116191359.000|20110116191401.000|CC1|FOR EXAMPLE, IN COLORADO SPRINGS
20110116191401.000|20110116191402.000|CC1|WHERE AN INDIVIDUAL WITH A      
20110116191402.000|20110116191405.000|CC1|CONCEALED CARRY STOPPED SOMEBODY
20110116191405.000|20110116191407.000|CC1|WHO WAS GOING TO KILL MULTIPLE  
20110116191407.000|20110116191409.000|CC1|PEOPLE IN A CHURCH, AND WOUNDED 
20110116191409.000|20110116191411.000|CC1|THEM SO THEY COULD NOT CONTINUE 
20110116191411.000|20110116191414.000|CC1|TO DO THAT.                     
20110116191414.000|20110116191416.000|CC1|IT'S A CONTROVERSIAL ISSUE.     
20110116191416.000|20110116191417.000|CC1|THE FACT IS, I WOULD GO BACK -- 
20110116191417.000|20110116191419.000|CC1|LET'S FIX THE REAL PROBLEM.     
20110116191419.000|20110116191421.000|CC1|HERE IS A MENTALLY DERANGED     
20110116191421.000|20110116191422.000|CC1|PERSON WHO HAD ACCESS TO A GUN  
20110116191422.000|20110116191423.000|CC1|THAT SHOULDN'T HAVE HAD ACCESS  
20110116191423.000|20110116191424.000|CC1|TO A GUN.                       
20110116191424.000|20110116191426.000|CC1|HOW DO WE STOP THAT?            
20110116191426.000|20110116191428.000|CC1|THERE'S A HOLE IN WHAT WE NEED  
20110116191428.000|20110116191429.000|CC1|TO DO.                          
20110116191429.000|20110116191431.000|CC1|I'M WILLING TO WORK WITH SENATOR
20110116191431.000|20110116191432.000|CC1|SCHUMER OR ANYBODY ELSE THAT    
20110116191432.000|20110116191433.000|CC1|WANTS TO MAKE SURE THAT PEOPLE  
20110116191433.000|20110116191434.000|CC1|WHO ARE MENTALLY ILL CANNOT GET 
20110116191434.000|20110116191439.000|CC1|AND USE A GUN.                  
20110116191439.000|20110116191439.000|CC1|>> ONE MORE ON THIS, SENATOR    
20110116191439.000|20110116191440.000|CC1|SCHUMER, WHAT ABOUT THE SECURITY
20110116191440.000|20110116191441.000|CC1|ASPECT OF THAT, AND SELF        
20110116191441.000|20110116191442.000|CC1|DEFENSE?                        
20110116191442.000|20110116191445.000|CC1|THERE ARE MEMBERS OF CONGRESS IN
20110116191445.000|20110116191446.000|CC1|THE HOUSE WHO HAVE SAID WHEN    
20110116191446.000|20110116191447.000|CC1|THEY GO OUT TO SIMILAR KINDS OF 
20110116191447.000|20110116191448.000|CC1|CONSTITUENT MEETINGS, THEY'RE   
20110116191448.000|20110116191449.000|CC1|GOING TO BRING A GUN.           
20110116191449.000|20110116191451.000|CC1|FORMER MEMBER DELAY SAID ON     
20110116191451.000|20110116191454.000|CC1|"HARDBALL" ON MSNBC, HE WOULD BE
20110116191454.000|20110116191455.000|CC1|HAPPY WITH PEOPLE WITH CONCEALED
20110116191455.000|20110116191456.000|CC1|WEAPONS, SO THAT ANYBODY WHO    
20110116191456.000|20110116191457.000|CC1|TRIED SOMETHING, THEY WOULD     
20110116191457.000|20110116191458.000|CC1|UNDERSTAND THAT THEY'RE GOING TO
20110116191458.000|20110116191500.000|CC1|DEFEND THEMSELVES.              
20110116191500.000|20110116191501.000|CC1|IS THAT THE RIGHT RESPONSE?     
20110116191501.000|20110116191503.000|CC1|>> THERE IS A RIGHT TO BEAR     
20110116191503.000|20110116191504.000|CC1|ARMS.                           
20110116191504.000|20110116191506.000|CC1|IT'S IN THE CONSTITUTION.       
20110116191506.000|20110116191507.000|CC1|YOU CAN'T IGNORE IT, JUST LIKE  
20110116191507.000|20110116191510.000|CC1|YOU CAN'T IGNORE THE OTHERS.    
20110116191510.000|20110116191516.000|CC1|LIKE THE OTHER RIGHTS, TEA NOT  
20110116191516.000|20110116191518.000|CC1|-- IT IS NOT ABSOLUTE.          
20110116191518.000|20110116191519.000|CC1|FIRST AMENDMENT, WE HAVE LAWS   
20110116191519.000|20110116191519.000|CC1|AGAINST PORNOGRAPHY.            
20110116191519.000|20110116191520.000|CC1|YOU CAN'T SCREAM FIRE FALSELY IN
20110116191520.000|20110116191521.000|CC1|A CROWDED THEATER.              
20110116191521.000|20110116191522.000|CC1|THERE SHOULD BE LIMITS ON GUN   
20110116191522.000|20110116191524.000|CC1|LAWS AS WELL THAT STILL PROTECT 
20110116191524.000|20110116191527.000|CC1|THE INDIVIDUALS' RIGHT TO BEAR  
20110116191527.000|20110116191531.000|CC1|ARMS.                           
20110116191531.000|20110116191532.000|CC1|JUST ONE POINT ABOUT YOURSY     
20110116191532.000|20110116191533.000|CC1|VARIOUS THAT SHOWED THE SUPPORT 
20110116191533.000|20110116191536.000|CC1|WENT DOWN, ONE OF THE REASONS IS
20110116191536.000|20110116191537.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF THE SUCCESS SESSION  
20110116191537.000|20110116191539.000|CC1|OF GUN CONTROL LAW.             
20110116191539.000|20110116191541.000|CC1|THE LADY LAW HAS BEEN A HUGE    
20110116191541.000|20110116191542.000|CC1|SUCCESS.                        
20110116191542.000|20110116191542.000|CC1|GUN VIOLENCE WENT DOWN.         
20110116191542.000|20110116191543.000|CC1|THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE KILLED BY  
20110116191543.000|20110116191544.000|CC1|CRIMINALS WHO HAD GUNS HAS      
20110116191544.000|20110116191544.000|CC1|DECLINED.                       
20110116191544.000|20110116191545.000|CC1|TO ME, IT'S AN INDICATION THAT  
20110116191545.000|20110116191547.000|CC1|SMART, RATIONAL GUN CONTROL LAWS
20110116191547.000|20110116191550.000|CC1|THAT PROTECT THE RIGHT TO BEAR  
20110116191550.000|20110116191551.000|CC1|ARMS, BUT HAVE REASONABLE LIMITS
20110116191551.000|20110116191554.000|CC1|ARE THE WAY TO GO.              
20110116191554.000|20110116191555.000|CC1|>> I WANT TO TALK ABOUT A FEW   
20110116191555.000|20110116191556.000|CC1|AGENDA ITEMS FOR CONGRESS       
20110116191556.000|20110116191557.000|CC1|GETTING BACK TO SESSION.

20110116191558.000|20110116191601.000|CC1|DISCOURSE AND WHERE THIS

20110116191832.000|20110116191837.000|CC1|>> LET ME SAY THIS.

20110116191841.000|20110116191842.000|CC1|WRONG AND SHOULD BE REJECTED.

20110116191844.000|20110116191845.000|CC1|OFFICIALS, HAVE AN OBLIGATION TO
20110116191845.000|20110116191846.000|CC1|TRY TO TONE THAT DOWN.

20110116191848.000|20110116191849.000|CC1|THE MEDIA WILL BE LESS          
20110116191849.000|20110116191851.000|CC1|VOCIFEROUS.                     
20110116191851.000|20110116191852.000|CC1|LET ME GIVE YOU AN EXAMPLE.     
20110116191852.000|20110116191858.000|CC1|CALLING FOR THE DEMOCRATS AND   
20110116191858.000|20110116191901.000|CC1|REPUBLICANS TO SIT TOGETHER.

20110116191918.000|20110116191918.000|CC1|WE BELIEVE IN DISCOURSE IN      
20110116191918.000|20110116191921.000|CC1|AMERICA, STRENUOUS DISCOURSE.

20110116191931.000|20110116191931.000|CC1|CAN DO IT CIVILLY.

20110116191938.000|20110116191939.000|CC1|>> SENATOR COBURN, ABOUT SITTING

20110116191950.000|20110116191951.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS ON THE

20110116191954.000|20110116191955.000|CC1|>> I THINK THE KEY, DAVID, IS   
20110116191955.000|20110116191957.000|CC1|PEOPLE GO BACK TO MOTIVE AND    
20110116191957.000|20110116192000.000|CC1|WHAT WE CAN'T QUESTION IS OUR

20110116192001.000|20110116192002.000|CC1|COUNTRY, CHUCK SCHUMER'S LOVE

20110116192007.000|20110116192008.000|CC1|WHEN WE START LOOKING AT MOTIVES

20110116192009.000|20110116192012.000|CC1|IDEOLOGY.                       
20110116192012.000|20110116192013.000|CC1|AND I THINK WHERE WE'VE HAD     
20110116192013.000|20110116192014.000|CC1|PROBLEMS IN THE SENATE, IT'S    
20110116192014.000|20110116192015.000|CC1|BEEN SMALL.                     
20110116192015.000|20110116192017.000|CC1|BUT THE FACT IS THAT ALWAYS     
20110116192017.000|20110116192019.000|CC1|COMES ABOUT WHEN PEOPLE ARE     
20110116192019.000|20110116192021.000|CC1|QUESTIONING MOTIVES.            
20110116192021.000|20110116192022.000|CC1|I THINK PEOPLE IN THE SENATE

20110116192032.000|20110116192033.000|CC1|WE DON'T HAVE THE               
20110116192033.000|20110116192034.000|CC1|LINCOLN/DOUGLAS DEBATE.

20110116192036.000|20110116192037.000|CC1|COUNTRY IS WE TALK PAST EACH    
20110116192037.000|20110116192039.000|CC1|OTHER, NOT TO EACH OTHER.       
20110116192039.000|20110116192040.000|CC1|CHUCK AND I HAVE BEEN ABLE TO   
20110116192040.000|20110116192042.000|CC1|WORK ON MULTIPLE BILLS, BECAUSE 
20110116192042.000|20110116192044.000|CC1|WE SIT DOWN, ONE ON ONE, AND    
20110116192044.000|20110116192047.000|CC1|WORK THINGS OUT.                
20110116192047.000|20110116192048.000|CC1|AND WHAT WE NEED TO DO IS HAVE  
20110116192048.000|20110116192049.000|CC1|MORE OF THAT, NOT LESS OF IT.   
20110116192049.000|20110116192050.000|CC1|>> CAN I ASK YOU -- WE HAVE     
20110116192050.000|20110116192051.000|CC1|ABOUT A MINUTE LEFT.            
20110116192051.000|20110116192052.000|CC1|I WANT TO GET A COUPLE OF ISSUES
20110116192052.000|20110116192053.000|CC1|IN HERE AND GET YOUR THOUGHTS.  
20110116192053.000|20110116192056.000|CC1|>> ONE MINUTE.

20110116193930.000|20110116193931.000|CC1|PORTION OF IT.

20110116193932.000|20110116193933.000|CC1|BUT I BELIEVE HE IS A PATRIOT,

20110116195723.000|20110116195724.000|CC1|FOR LOVE.                       
20110116195724.000|20110116195724.000|CC1|I WANT TO BE AN EXTREMIST FOR   
20110116195724.000|20110116195725.000|CC1|JUSTICE.                        
20110116195725.000|20110116195725.000|CC1|HE WAS ABLE TO FIGHT WITH

20110116195726.000|20110116195727.000|CC1|MUTED VOICE, BUT WITH AN

20110116195728.000|20110116195729.000|CC1|SO IN A WAY THAT WAS COMPLETELY 
20110116195729.000|20110116195731.000|CC1|NONVIOLENT AND COMPLETELY OPEN
